lead_paragraph: Ferrari's Fernando Alonso won a dramatic Formula One Malaysian Grand Prix on Sunday, Sergio Pérez, a 22-year-old Mexican with the Sauber team, drove the race of his life to finish second.
snippet: Ferrari's Fernando Alonso won a dramatic Formula One Malaysian Grand Prix on Sunday, Sergio Pérez, a 22-year-old Mexican with the Sauber team, drove the race of his life to finish second.
